subject.topic: Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836. Narrative of the life of David Crockett of the state of Tennessee

mods.abstract: Davy Crockett (1786-1836). Full length portrait. He wears woodsmen clothing with fringe at the collar and coat bottom, and boots. Pouch and knife at his waist. He carries a rifle and a racoon cap. The background is wooded. He stands in front of a tree. In the lower left side, "Tennessee" is written in dots.
